VriV Fresh Pvt. Ltd. is a technology Company in the field of catering fresh food and refreshments service via mobile application and traditional delivery system.

The Company is in the business of food preparations, food ordering and delivery based out of Mumbai, India. We at VriV Fresh have innovated a unique and distinguish setup and system that not only enriches the value of food and beverage makers and delivery eco system but also to the experience of customers.

It endeavours to enable the local eateries to better communicate and serve the customers through its digital platform.
name: Vriv fresh Private Limited

idea:
CompressorWale - India’s one and only designated web-portal for air compressor information. Our USP is that we are One Stop Destination for all Air Compressor related information covering below avenues:-
1) New Compressors and Accessories: One portal to get information of every model under every brand being manufactured / sold in India with comparison features thereby reducing time and effort of the prospective customer. Click here
2) Need-a-Compressor: If you want assistance in sizing and buying your air compressor, do fill this form. Our experts will give you consultation over the phone. Click here
3) Used Air Compressors: a medium for buyers and sellers of used machines to meet and solve their compressed air needs. Click here
4) Know-a-Compressor: Anyone wanting to get educated on technical aspects of Air Compressors will land on this section that could be a prospective customer. Click here

5) News & Updates and Videos of Indian Air Compressor Industry: For those who want to be always connected to what is going around in the Indian compressor industry. Click here for News & Updates, Click here for Videos


Our mission is to simplify and shorten your research and buying process and to help you choose the RIGHT compressor among the various compressors available, giving you important specifications, features and comparison on one portal, making it an easier and user-friendly approach.
The need for aggregators and marketplace for used machines in today’s time is more than ever and users in India are realizing its importance.
Compressor Machines are being used in majorly all industries- Textiles, Pharmaceutical, Automotive, Chemical, Food & Beverage, Cosmetics etc., we saw the problem of consumers hopping from dealer-to-dealer and a lack of an organised marketplace for buyers and sellers of used compressors. Discovering the gap in the market, with Internet being a great medium and India going “Digital”, we were inspired and passionate to fill-in and provide a simpler solution to our Indian consumers.
Here at CompressorWale we keep things unbiased and transparent suggesting you a range of options to buy an air compressor which best suits your parameters.
name: Compressor Wale

idea:
In Mumbai, advertising on taxi tops was not permitted until the passing of the resolution dated 10-01-2018 titled Resolution No 06/2018. With the passing of this resolution, such installations are permissible (including but not limited to backlit panels and fixations atop the carrier). The ease of installation shall be subject to the requirements relating to visibility, safety, distractions and so forth. The Maharashtra State Transport Authority in their document, titled “ITEM NO:9, Regarding advertisement on vehicles falling in Motor Cab Category, in accordance with section 134{1] of Maharashtra Motor Vehicles Rules 1989” categorically lists the size restrictions, possible placements, and other specifications for all advertisement mediums.
The number of “kaali-peeli” taxis in Mumbai is estimated to be 55,000. As Litcorp, our motive is to be the first mover to take advantage of the newly passed resolution; through advertisement installations fixed atop the carriers of the “kali-peeli” taxis, and maximum visibility that comes from the design.
The carriers on top of the taxis have 3 standardized designs. Therefore, the moment of maximum opportunity is now as no other media firms to the best of our knowledge have started working on installations such as these, and our design specifications are such that they encompass almost all taxi requirements.
Our business model is rudimentary in nature. The nature of the numbers forecast in this document come from thorough research into the costs and notional profits keeping in mind the marketability of the service we are going to offer, as well as the requirements cited by the various authorities pertaining to the matter at hand.
Litcorp shall provide for the installations for the carriers, negotiate with agencies that would possibly utilize our spaces, and for periodic redressing of advertisements even when taxis are not in use.
Advertising on top of taxi cabs is a previously untapped market, which can provide major benefits to the Taxi unions as well as all the taxi owners that come under their jurisdiction.
name: Litcorp

idea:
BRIEF:

Building individual professional networks requires a lot of time, money and dedication, and so does maintaining these networks. We enable you to start professional networking immediately at BlueTie instead of exhausting time and effort into building networks from scratch. With BlueTie, you get to discover and meet the professionals with co-relating objectives, at that moment. Through this, you unlock endless opportunities with professionals whose objectives match yours.


WHAT DO WE ENABLE:

Objective Based Networking

BlueTie focuses on Objective Driven Networking, which allows one to access professionals with co-relating objectives at that point of time, increasing the effectivity of networking. 

Go Beyond

It enables professionals to not just be limited to a set of connections but to go beyond their individual networks, leveraging on clear objectives and matching fortes while creating mutual synergy in process. 

Networking without Bounds

On BlueTie, Professionals can start networking from day one, without the hassles to build or manage an individual network

Acknowledgement System

An optimized acknowledgement system makes sure, the process of networking is enhanced and experience is better

BlueTie Pin 

A unique professionals contact detail enables professionals to network in a safe and controlled eco-system and reduces spam
name: BLUE TIE GLOBAL PRIVATE LIMITED
